title: ‘I Need to Keep An Eye On Remco’: Tadej Pogačar Switches Tour de France Focus
content:
Satisfied yellow jersey wearer rates his performance higher than Giro TT win and is happy to take time on rivals Vingegaard and Roglič.

Read the full article at ‘I Need to Keep An Eye On Remco’: Tadej Pogačar Switches Tour de France Focus on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
